product.name: Round Dining Set
product.description: The 5-piece dining set is covered in this magnificent silver hue with detailed trimmed and dainty leg supports. Each dining chair is upholstered in elegant plush cushion.

product.name: Velvet Upholstered Bed
product.description: Crafted from solid rubberwood, this piece features a low-profile, streamlined design that works well in any contemporary setting.

product.name: Leather Platform Bed
product.description: Renovate your bedroom decor with this stunning Upholstered Platform Bed. The base creates stability and sturdiness while the widened sides add to the modern appearance.

product.name: Industrial Dining Set
product.description: This is a quality industrial table set. Metal base made from sturdy iron, the tabletop is made of high-quality MDF.

product.name: Leather Square Arm Sofa
product.description: Crafted from solid wood, this leather sofa stands atop thin legs and features a track-arm design wrapped in leather for a textured appearance.

product.name: Velvet Round Arm Loveseat
product.description: With its elegantly curved silhouette and luxurious velvet upholstery, this sofa is eye-catching from all angles.
